definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: Results The developmental growth characteristics of the introduced Pfaffia in Nanning are stable.
sentences.chinese: 结果珐菲亚在南宁生长发育特性稳定。

sentences.english: The proposed plant will be built by the French company Areva.
sentences.chinese: 被提议的核电站将由法国公司阿海珐建立。

sentences.english: Anne Lauvergeon, chief executive of Areva, ranked 3rd.
sentences.chinese: 排在第三的则是法国阿海珐电力集团执行长罗维津。

sentences.english: I want a good cut of meat.
sentences.chinese: 我要一片好场珐摆貉肢股扮瘫堡凯肉。

sentences.english: The contract is worth around $3.5 billion, Areva said in a statement.
sentences.chinese: 阿海珐在一项声明中说这项合同价值35亿美元。

definition: "blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
